text: (tae anak del sabbayrikreay nung pheap kmean chomnue brasaer cheang) ryy muoy anak del korp sakkar champoh a l laoh nowpel yb daoy saou chout ning chhr teang khlach champoh thngai barlok haey sangkhum champoh kdei me tda krounea pi mcheasa robsa ke brasaer cheang? chaur anak ( mou ham meat) pol tha tae banda anak del chehdoeng ning anak del min chehdoeng smaekna der ryyte? pitabrakd nasa meante banhnheachn teanglay bonnaoh del cheh pichearna
